lead_paragraph: SWAIN--Elizabeth. The New York Academy of Medicine acknowledges with profound sorrow the death of Elizabeth Swain, Fellow of the Academy since 2009. We join many in remembering her as an untiring advocate for the community health center movement, a generous colleague, and a thoughtful leader in health care policy. The Academy Board, Fellows and staff extend deepest condolences to her family. Jo Ivey Boufford, M.D., President George E. Thibault, Chairman, Board of Trustees 1/3
